text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

translation.en: And they denied him, so We destroyed them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers
translation.id: Maka mereka mendustakannya (Hud), lalu Kami binasakan mereka. Sungguh, pada yang demikian itu terdapat tanda (kekuasaan Allah), tetapi kebanyakan mereka tidak beriman
